quests.name: Identify Daily Triggers
quests.description: Notice and document the moments, people, or situations that trigger your protective archetype today. Reflect on what patterns emerge.
quests.placeholder: What triggered your protective archetype today?

quests.name: Log Negative Frequency
quests.description: Track when you operated from your protective archetype. Notice the frequency, context, and emotional charge.
quests.placeholder: When did you notice your protective archetype showing up?

quests.name: Log Positive Frequency
quests.description: Celebrate moments when you showed up as your essence archetype today. What were you doing? How did it feel?
quests.placeholder: When did you embody your essence archetype today?

quests.name: Observe Protective Archetype
quests.description: Take a moment to observe your protective archetype in action without judgment. What are you protecting yourself from?
quests.placeholder: What did you observe about your protective archetype?

quests.name: Observe Essence Archetype
quests.description: Notice when your essence archetype naturally emerged today. What conditions allowed it to shine through?
quests.placeholder: How did your essence archetype show up today?

quests.name: Complete Archetype Quiz
quests.description: Deepen your understanding by taking the extended archetype quiz. Explore nuances of your protective and essence patterns.

quests.name: AI Healing Compass Flow
quests.description: Navigate your inner landscape with the AI Healing Compass. Discover what needs attention on your journey.

quests.name: Ikigai Completion
quests.description: Explore your reason for being. Complete the Ikigai framework to clarify where passion, mission, vocation, and profession intersect.
quests.placeholder: Share your key Ikigai insights

quests.name: Level of Consciousness Quiz
quests.description: Discover where you operate on the consciousness spectrum. Understand your current state and growth edges.

quests.name: Nervous System Sway Test
quests.description: Assess your nervous system's current state. Learn whether you're in fight/flight, freeze, or flow.

quests.name: Define Your Success
quests.description: What does success look like for YOU, beyond external validation? Write your personal definition.
quests.placeholder: What does success mean to you?

quests.name: Persona Deep Dive
quests.description: Explore your current persona stage (Vibe Seeker, Vibe Riser, or Movement Maker). Where are you now and where are you headed?
quests.placeholder: Reflect on your persona journey

quests.name: External Flow Log
quests.description: Document times when you experienced flow in external activities. What conditions created that state?
quests.placeholder: When did you experience external flow?

quests.name: Non-Fiction Content Consumption
quests.description: Engage with educational content that expands your self-awareness. Book, podcast, course - your choice.
quests.placeholder: What did you learn?

quests.name: Daily Release Challenge
quests.description: Let go of one thing today that no longer serves you. A belief, a habit, a grudge, or a limiting story.
quests.placeholder: What are you releasing today?

quests.name: Let Go of Negative Charge
quests.description: When something triggers you today, practice releasing the emotional charge. What do you need to let go of?
quests.placeholder: What emotional charge are you releasing?

quests.name: Weekly Big Release
quests.description: Identify and release a major pattern, belief, or behavior that's been holding you back. Go deep.
quests.placeholder: What significant pattern are you releasing this week?

quests.name: Behavior Change
quests.description: Consciously choose a new behavior aligned with your essence archetype. Act on it today.
quests.placeholder: What new behavior did you practice?

quests.name: Dopamine Diet Change
quests.description: Replace a quick-hit dopamine activity (social media, junk food) with something nourishing.
quests.placeholder: What did you replace and with what?

quests.name: Customer Acquisition Task
quests.description: Take one action toward attracting your ideal audience or customers. Post, reach out, create, or connect.
quests.placeholder: What action did you take?

quests.name: Identify 3 Criteria
quests.description: Define 3 criteria for a decision, goal, or boundary. Clarity creates powerful action.
quests.placeholder: What are your 3 criteria?

quests.name: Protective to Essence Shift
quests.description: Catch yourself in protective mode and consciously shift to your essence archetype. Document the shift.
quests.placeholder: How did you shift from protective to essence?

quests.name: Groan Challenge: Skills
quests.description: Do something that makes you groan but develops a key skill. Growth happens outside comfort.
quests.placeholder: What skill-building groan task did you complete?

quests.name: Groan Challenge: Serve Persona
quests.description: Create or share something that serves your ideal audience, even if it feels vulnerable.
quests.placeholder: How did you serve your persona this week?

quests.name: Groan Challenge: Solve Problem
quests.description: Tackle a problem you've been avoiding. The groan is the growth edge.
quests.placeholder: What problem did you solve?

quests.name: 3% Better Task
quests.description: Identify one area where you can improve by just 3% this week. Small steps compound.
quests.placeholder: What did you improve by 3%?

quests.name: Morning Meditation
quests.description: Start your day with meditation. Even 5 minutes of stillness reconnects you to your essence.

quests.name: Morning Dance
quests.description: Move your body with joy. Dance to reconnect with your physical self and shake off protective patterns.

quests.name: Morning Breathwork
quests.description: Practice conscious breathing to regulate your nervous system and anchor into presence.

quests.name: Self-Identified Activity
quests.description: Do something that reconnects you to YOU. Your choice, your ritual, your essence.
quests.placeholder: What did you do to reconnect today?

quests.name: Weekly Self-Identified Task
quests.description: Choose a weekly reconnection practice that deeply resonates with you. Make it meaningful.
quests.placeholder: What was your reconnection practice this week?

quests.name: Clothing Item Ritual
quests.description: Choose a clothing item or accessory that represents your essence. Wear it intentionally.
quests.placeholder: What item did you choose and why?

quests.name: Check Groan Wheel
quests.description: Review your life wheel (health, relationships, career, etc). Where are you out of balance?
quests.placeholder: What did you discover about your life balance?

quests.name: Remove Negative Environment
quests.description: Identify and remove yourself from an environment, relationship, or situation that drains your essence.
quests.placeholder: What negative environment did you address?

quests.name: Feedback Form
quests.description: Share your experience with the challenge. Your feedback helps us improve the journey for everyone.
quests.placeholder: What feedback do you have about the challenge?

quests.name: Post IG Groan
quests.description: Share your groan moment on Instagram. Vulnerability is magnetic. Tag us!

quests.name: Tell a Friend
quests.description: Share Find My Flow with someone who's searching for their path. Essence recognizes essence.

quests.name: Buy Essence Ring
quests.description: Invest in a physical reminder of your essence archetype. Wear your truth.

quests.name: Weekly Elephant Report
quests.description: Submit your weekly reflection. Track your transformation over the 7 days.
quests.placeholder: Share your weekly reflection

artifacts.name: Essence Boat
artifacts.description: Your vessel for navigating the waters of self-discovery.

artifacts.name: Captain's Hat
artifacts.description: Symbol of taking command by letting go.

artifacts.name: Treasure Map
artifacts.description: Chart your course to your essence archetype.

artifacts.name: Sailing Sails
artifacts.description: Harness the wind of your true self.
